name: Spring Capital Asia
overview:
Spring Capital Asia is an independent private equity firm investing exclusively in China and Hong Kong. Founded in 2007 by one of the most experienced investors in China, Spring Capital Asia identifies and invest in early growth capital investments in lower mid market companies with high growth potentials.

Headquartered in Hong Kong with an office in Shanghai, Spring Capital has a highly experienced local team with superior long term track records and an extensive network of resources to support its portfolio companies.

Spring Capital invests in healthcare and cleantech sectors as well as opportunitistic transactions in other sectors.
